meanings.definition: A person who supports or promotes something.
meanings.sent1: The favorer of the team cheered loudly at the game.
meanings.sent2: She is known as a favorer of local businesses in the community.
meanings.sent3: The favorer of sunny weather was delighted by the forecast.
meanings.sent4: As a favorer of healthy eating, she always chooses salads over fast food.
meanings.sent5: The favorer of peace and harmony always seeks to resolve conflicts peacefully.

meanings.definition: To show approval or preference for something.
meanings.sent1: He will favorer the blue paint for the walls of his room.
meanings.sent2: She tends to favorer action movies over romantic comedies.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to favorer the new toy over the old one.
meanings.sent4: The teacher will favorer hard work and dedication in her students.
meanings.sent5: She will always favorer honesty and integrity in her relationships.
